The dragon exhales acid in a 15-­‐foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a
DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 (5d8) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4)
acid damage.

The dragon can breathe air and water.

name: Black Dragon Wyrmling
senses: blindsight 10 ft., darkvision 60 ft., passive Perception 14
